about_the_game:
Pack a punch with this weapon pack! Each character gets two new weapons.

Includes the following:
  • Neptune's Weapon Set
  • Noire's Weapon Set
  • Blanc's Weapon Set
  • Vert's Weapon Set
  • Nepgear's Weapon Set
  • Uni's Weapon Set
  • Rom's Weapon Set
  • Ram's Weapon Set
  • Uzume's Weapon Set
  • Older Neptune's Set
  • IF's Weapon Set
  • Compa's Weapon Set
  • B-Sha's Weapon Set
  • S-Sha's Weapon Set
  • C-Sha's Weapon Set
  • K-Sha's Weapon Set
